DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Insulin NPH Compared New Insulin Formulation Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes least 12 month Current NPH treatment least 3 month alone insulin combination OADs Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 40 kg/m2 HbA1c le equal 9.5 % FPG le equal 12 mmol/L Treatment Glucagonlike peptide 1 mimetics dipeptityl peptidase IV inhibitor Treatment 1 IU/kg NPH insulin daily Known hypoglycaemia unawareness recurrent major hypoglycaemia , judge Investigator Known suspect allergy trial product relate product Receipt investigational drug within one month prior trial Any condition Investigator feel would interfere trial participation evaluation result , e.g . shiftworkers
